subject: Product availability
description_text:
Hi,
Im intrested in buying your VAM Pro Haptic motors for my Simsonn pedals but
it seems that it's unavailable or Im just unable to order it to my country
which is Poland. Will they become available again or not. Would be grateful
for your reply.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mateusz Boruta,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland     â€‹https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product%20brand=Simsonn
Hi, sorry for trouble I wasn't aware that there is Polish distributor. Thanks for helping.
